targets.query:
from(bucket: "plc_data_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "AI00PV")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group()

from(bucket: "plc_data_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ai_01pv")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group()
SELECT last("di00_input") FROM "DI_PV_DATA" WHERE time > now() - 30d AND "sensor"::tag = 'DI00'
SELECT last("di01_input") FROM "DI_PV_DATA" WHERE time > now() - 30d AND "sensor"::tag = 'DI01'
SELECT last("di02_input") FROM "DI_PV_DATA" WHERE time > now() - 30d AND "sensor"::tag = 'DI02'
SELECT last("di03_input") FROM "DI_PV_DATA" WHERE time > now() - 30d AND "sensor"::tag = 'DI03'

confirmModal.title: Confirm update request

targets.query: SELECT last("ao_00out") AS "OUT 1" FROM "AO_PV_DATA" WHERE time > now() - 30d AND "sensor"::tag = 'AO00'
SELECT last("ao_01out") AS "OUT 2" FROM "AO_PV_DATA" WHERE time > now() - 30d AND "sensor"::tag = 'AO01'
SELECT last("ai_02pv") AS "FEED 1" FROM "AI_PV_DATA" WHERE time > now() - 30d AND "sensor"::tag = 'AI02_FEED'
SELECT last("ai_03pv") AS "FEED 2" FROM "AI_PV_DATA" WHERE time > now() - 30d AND "sensor"::tag = 'AI03_FEED'

panels.title: Salidas analogicas y retornos de posición

targets.query: SELECT mean("ao_00out") AS "OUT 1" FROM "AO_PV_DATA" WHERE "sensor"::tag = 'AO00'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("ai_02pv") AS "FEED 1" FROM "AI_PV_DATA" WHERE "sensor"::tag ='AI02_FEED' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
